location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 616 x 864mm, on sheet 756 x 900mm.

mods.abstract: Map depicting the south-western part of the Arabian Peninsula and the surrounding area (East Africa, the Red Sea, and the Gulf of Aden are also featured). The map indicates hydrology, boundaries, routes and settlements, as well as providing some indication of relief in the form of hachures.Published by the War Office's Geographical Section, General Staff, 1930 (this copy is dated February 1932).
